job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongWe are a part of Emerging Technologies and Incubation Group passionate about identifying breakthrough emerging solutions that build new markets and businesses for Cisco We incubate these new opportunities in partnership with our business groups partners and other startups The team also continues to progress Ciscos important work with Standards bodies and manage research partnerships with leadingedge UniversitiesbrbrstrongstrongWhat Youll DobrbrstrongstrongAs an SRE team member you will be responsible for crafting and evolving the environments tooling and practices used by continually evolving application teams as they transform research ideas into products that will be taken to market to make a significant difference for Cisco and the industry Specifically you willbrbrUse sound systems design to deliver available observable and scalable common servicesbrbrCollaborate with our partners from the multiple application teams who are demonstrating our services working to ensure their successbrbrParticipate in evaluations and build vs buy decisions across open source and the greater Cisco community for each service required as well as its implementation including deployment monitoring and evolutionbrbrDevelop software  code scripts and configuration  to optimally and repeatedly deploy monitor and evolve servicesbrbrDevelop standards and practices used by all teams  application and platform  to build operable servicesbrbrParticipate in the oncall rotation for the services delivered by the SREPlatform teambrbrParticipate in Incident Command assisting application service owners with triage remediation and postmortems for their incidents ensuring lessons learned are implemented across all teamsbrbrstrongstrongWho Youll Work WithbrbrstrongstrongThe Emerging Technologies and Incubation ETampI team is a highly visible group which reports directly to Ciscos CEO ETampI focuses on the next wave of innovation by anticipating investing in and incubating new technologies and business venturesbrbrYou will be part of the Incubation team in the US to develop new solutions and bring them to market in a startup like environmentbrbrstrongstrongWho You ArebrbrstrongstrongStartup experience strongly preferred you have worked in startups or startup ventures within larger organizationsbrbrOutstanding verbal and written communication skillsbrbrSystemslevel thinker you consider where a problem should be solved not just howbrbrAbility to thrive in a multifaceted everchanging environmentbrbrWillingness to lead and do while this is an individual contributor role you will be responsible for taking the initiative to drive your own projects to completion as well as ensuring the success of those who you are building forbrbrExpertise and experience in delivering largescale systems using cloud technologies including but not limited to public cloud platforms such as GCP Azure amp AWSbrbrWell versed with engineering QA and technical operations practices with agile application development and delivery vehiclesbrbr2 years experience with software development We build repeatable systems through automationbrbr2 years experience with DevOps or infrastructureascode tools such as Puppet Chef Ansible or TerraformbrbrBachelors Degree in Computer Science CIS Engineering or related field or equivalent experiencebrbrstrongWe Are CiscobrbrstrongWeAreCisco where each person is unique but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference Heres how we do itbrbrWe embrace digital and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses Some may think were old 30 years strong and only about hardware but were also a software company And a security company An AIMachine Learning company We even invented an intuitive network that adapts predicts learns and protects No other company can do what we do  you cant put us in a boxbrbrBut Digital Transformation is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation creativity and yes even failure if you learn from itbrbrDay to day we focus on the give and take We give our best we give our egos a break and we give of ourselves because giving back is built into our DNA We take accountability we take bold steps and we take difference to heart Because without diversity of thought and a commitment to equality for all there is no moving forwardbrbrSo you have colorful hair Dont care Tattoos Show off your ink Like polka dots Thats cool
